from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from pyspark.sql import types as T
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Construct the base Delta Lake path
base_delta_path = f"abfss://curated@{storage_account}.dfs.core.windows.net/ESHT/ECDS/"

# ---------------------------------------------
# Function to Create and Register Delta Tables
# ---------------------------------------------

def create_and_register_delta_table(table_name, schema, table_suffix, comment=None):
    """
    Creates and registers a Delta table.

    :param table_name: Name of the table to register in the metastore.
    :param schema: StructType schema of the DataFrame.
    :param table_suffix: Suffix to append to the base path for the Delta table.
    :param comment: Optional comment to add as metadata for the table.
    """
    # Define the Delta table path
    delta_table_path = f"{base_delta_path}/{table_suffix}"

    # Create an empty DataFrame with the defined schema
    df = spark.createDataFrame([], schema)

    # Write the DataFrame as a Delta table to initialize it
    df.write.format("delta") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .option("overwriteSchema", "true") \
        .save(delta_table_path)

    # Register the table in the metastore with an optional comment
    if comment:
        spark.sql(f"""
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {table_name}
            USING DELTA
            LOCATION '{delta_table_path}'
            COMMENT '{comment}'
        """)
    else:
        spark.sql(f"""
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {table_name}
            USING DELTA
            LOCATION '{delta_table_path}'
        """)

# ---------------------------------------------
# Define Schemas for Each Table
# ---------------------------------------------

# Schema for ECDS_Accomodation_Type
schema_eCDS_accomodation_type = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("IdOrder", T.IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("AccomodationTypeDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("AccomodationDateAdded", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("AccomodationTypeSNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_AlcoholDrug
schema_eCDS_alcoholdrug = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("EC_Injury_Alcohol_Drug", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AlcoholDrugDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_AttendanceOccurrence
schema_eCDS_attendanceoccurrence = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Prof_Reg_Issuer_Code", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Prof_Reg_Entry_Identifier", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Care_Prof_Tier", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Care_Prof_Dis_Resp_Ind", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_CodedClinicalObservations
schema_eCDS_codedclinicalobservations = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ObsId", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("obsdetailsid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Coded_ObservationSNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Coded_ObservationDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Observation_Value", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("UCUM_Unit_of_Measurement", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Coded_Observation_Timestamp", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_CodedScoredAssessment
schema_eCDS_codedscoredassessment = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ObsId", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Coded_Assessment_Tool_TypeSNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Coded_Assessment_Tool_TypeDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Person_Score", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Assessment_Tool_Validation_Timestamp", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_Comorbidity
schema_eCDS_comorbidity = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ComorbidityIDOrder", T.IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Comorbidity", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ComorbidityDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_Diagnosis
schema_eCDS_diagnosis = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("DiagnosiosisDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("EC_Diagnosis_CodeSNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Coded_Clinical_Entry_Seq_Num", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("EC_Diagnosis_QualifierSNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("DiagnosisQualifierDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("EC_Diagnosis_LataralitySNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("DiagnosisLataralityDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("DiagnosisComment", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_Diagnosis_xTab (Dynamic Schema)
# Define the initial schema fields
schema_fields_diagnosis_xtab = [
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False)
]

# Dynamically create fields for diagnoses 1-10
for i in range(1, 11):
    schema_fields_diagnosis_xtab.extend([
        T.StructField(f"Diagnosiosis{i}Desc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
        T.StructField(f"EC_Diagnosis_Code{i}SNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
        T.StructField(f"DiagnosisQualifier{i}Desc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
        T.StructField(f"EC_Diagnosis_Qualifier{i}SNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
        T.StructField(f"DiagnosisLatarality{i}Desc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
        T.StructField(f"EC_Diagnosis_Latarality{i}SNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True)
    ])

# Add InsertedOn field
schema_fields_diagnosis_xtab.append(T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True))

# Create the dynamic schema
schema_eCDS_diagnosis_xtab = T.StructType(schema_fields_diagnosis_xtab)

# Schema for ECDS_EMED3_Fit_Note
schema_eCDS_emed3_fit_note = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Assess_Date", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Condition", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Diagnosis", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Start_Date", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("End_Date", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Duration", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Recorded_Date", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Follow_Up_Ind", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Note_Issuer", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_ExpectedDateTimeOfTreatment
schema_eCDS_expected_datetime_of_treatment = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Emergency_Care_Expected_Timestamp", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Emergency_Care_Treatment_Timestamp", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)  # Added for consistency
])

# Schema for ECDS_Investigations
schema_eCDS_investigations = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("InvestigationOrder", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("InvestigationDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("EC_Investigation_Date_Time", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("EC_InvestigationCodeCDS", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_MentalHealthActLegalStatus
schema_eCDS_mentalhealthactlegalstatus = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("IdOrder", T.IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("MHA_LSCP_Start_Date_Time", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("MHA_LSCP_Expiry_Date_Time", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("MHA_LegalStatusClassifactionCode", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("MHA_LegalStatusClassifactionDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_Personal_Circumstances
schema_eCDS_personal_circumstances = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Soc_Per_SNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Soc_Per_Description", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Soc_Per_Timestamp", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_Procedure
schema_eCDS_procedure = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("IdOrder", T.IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("MHA_LSCP_Start_Date_Time", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("MHA_LSCP_Expiry_Date_Time", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("MHA_LegalStatusClassifactionCode", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("MHA_LegalStatusClassifactionDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_ReferralsToOtherServices
schema_eCDS_referrals_to_other_services = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Referred_To_Service_Order", T.IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Referred_To_Service_Code", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Referred_To_Service_Desc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Activity_Service_Request_Date_Time", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Referred_To_Service_Assess_Date_Time", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_SafeguardingConcern
schema_eCDS_safeguarding_concern = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("LogID", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("StepDescription", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("StepStart", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("StepFinish", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("StepDurationSecs", T.StringType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_StoredProc_Log
schema_eCDS_storedproc_log = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("LogID", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("StepDescription", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("StepStart", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("StepFinish", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("StepDurationSecs", T.StringType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_UpdateErrorText
schema_eCDS_update_error_text = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("RunId", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ErrorText", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False)
])

# Schema for ECDStoCDS_MappingCodes
schema_eCDStoCDS_mappingcodes = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("MappingCodeID", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("MappingSubType", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ECDSCode", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ECDSDescription", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("CDS", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InjFlag", T.IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Active", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)  # Added for consistency
])

# Schema for ECDStoCDS_MappingSubTypes
schema_eCDStoCDS_mappingsubtypes = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("MappingCodeID", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("MappingSubType", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ECDSCode", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ECDSDescription", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("CDS", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InjFlag", T.IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Active", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)  # Added for consistency
])

# Schema for refECDS_SensitiveCodesSNOMED
schema_refECDS_SensitiveCodesSNOMED = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("snomed", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Sensitive_Flag", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# ---------------------------------------------
# Create and Register Delta Tables
# ---------------------------------------------

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_Accomodation_Type",
    schema=schema_eCDS_accomodation_type,
    table_suffix="ECDS_Accomodation_Type"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_AlcoholDrug",
    schema=schema_eCDS_alcoholdrug,
    table_suffix="ECDS_AlcoholDrug"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_AttendanceOccurrence",
    schema=schema_eCDS_attendanceoccurrence,
    table_suffix="ECDS_AttendanceOccurrence"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_CodedClinicalObservations",
    schema=schema_eCDS_codedclinicalobservations,
    table_suffix="ECDS_CodedClinicalObservations"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_CodedScoredAssessment",
    schema=schema_eCDS_codedscoredassessment,
    table_suffix="ECDS_CodedScoredAssessment"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_Comorbidity",
    schema=schema_eCDS_comorbidity,
    table_suffix="ECDS_Comorbidity"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_Diagnosis",
    schema=schema_eCDS_diagnosis,
    table_suffix="ECDS_Diagnosis"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_Diagnosis_xTab",
    schema=schema_eCDS_diagnosis_xtab,
    table_suffix="ECDS_Diagnosis_xTab"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_EMED3_Fit_Note",
    schema=schema_eCDS_emed3_fit_note,
    table_suffix="ECDS_EMED3_Fit_Note"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_ExpectedDateTimeOfTreatment",
    schema=schema_eCDS_expected_datetime_of_treatment,
    table_suffix="ECDS_ExpectedDateTimeOfTreatment"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_Investigations",
    schema=schema_eCDS_investigations,
    table_suffix="ECDS_Investigations"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_MentalHealthActLegalStatus",
    schema=schema_eCDS_mentalhealthactlegalstatus,
    table_suffix="ECDS_MentalHealthActLegalStatus"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_Personal_Circumstances",
    schema=schema_eCDS_personal_circumstances,
    table_suffix="ECDS_Personal_Circumstances"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_Procedure",
    schema=schema_eCDS_procedure,
    table_suffix="ECDS_Procedure"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_ReferralsToOtherServices",
    schema=schema_eCDS_referrals_to_other_services,
    table_suffix="ECDS_ReferralsToOtherServices"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_SafeguardingConcern",
    schema=schema_eCDS_safeguarding_concern,
    table_suffix="ECDS_SafeguardingConcern"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_StoredProc_Log_tbl",
    schema=schema_eCDS_storedproc_log,
    table_suffix="ECDS_StoredProc_Log"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDS_UpdateErrorText",
    schema=schema_eCDS_update_error_text,
    table_suffix="ECDS_UpdateErrorText"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDStoCDS_MappingCodes",
    schema=schema_eCDStoCDS_mappingcodes,
    table_suffix="ECDStoCDS_MappingCodes"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="ECDStoCDS_MappingSubTypes",
    schema=schema_eCDStoCDS_mappingsubtypes,
    table_suffix="ECDStoCDS_MappingSubTypes"
)

create_and_register_delta_table(
    table_name="refECDS_SensitiveCodesSNOMED",
    schema=schema_refECDS_SensitiveCodesSNOMED,
    table_suffix="refECDS_SensitiveCodesSNOMED",
    comment="https://digital.nhs.uk/binaries/content/assets/website-assets/services/sus/sus-guidance/legally_restricted_codes-16.xlsx"
)

# Note: Remember to enforce the primary keys in your write operations.

from pyspark.sql.functions import functions as F, types as T 
from delta.tables import DeltaTable 

# ---------------------------------------------
# Configuration Section
# ---------------------------------------------

storage_account = "dlsrxcdevuksdp01"

# Construct the base Delta Lake path
base_delta_path = f"abfss://curated@{storage_account}.dfs.core.windows.net/ESHT/ECDS/"

# ---------------------------------------------
# Function to Create and Register Delta Tables
# ---------------------------------------------

def create_and_register_delta_table(table_name, schema, table_suffix, comment=None):
    """
    Creates and registers a Delta table.

    :param table_name: Name of the table to register in the metastore.
    :param schema: StructType schema of the DataFrame.
    :param table_suffix: Suffix to append to the base path for the Delta table.
    :param comment: Optional comment to add as metadata for the table.
    """
    # Define the Delta table path
    delta_table_path = f"{base_delta_path}/{table_suffix}"

    # Create an empty DataFrame with the defined schema
    df = spark.createDataFrame([], schema)

    # Write the DataFrame as a Delta table to initialize it
    df.write.format("delta") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .option("overwriteSchema", "true") \
        .save(delta_table_path)

    # Register the table in the metastore with an optional comment
    if comment:
        spark.sql(f"""
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {table_name}
            USING DELTA
            LOCATION '{delta_table_path}'
            COMMENT '{comment}'
        """)
    else:
        spark.sql(f"""
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {table_name}
            USING DELTA
            LOCATION '{delta_table_path}'
        """)

# ---------------------------------------------
# Define Schemas for Each Table
# ---------------------------------------------

# Schema for ECDS_Accomodation_Type
schema_eCDS_accomodation_type = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("IdOrder", T.IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("AccomodationTypeDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("AccomodationDateAdded", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("AccomodationTypeSNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_AlcoholDrug
schema_eCDS_alcoholdrug = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("EC_Injury_Alcohol_Drug", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AlcoholDrugDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_AttendanceOccurrence
schema_eCDS_attendanceoccurrence = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Prof_Reg_Issuer_Code", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Prof_Reg_Entry_Identifier", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Care_Prof_Tier", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Care_Prof_Dis_Resp_Ind", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_CodedClinicalObservations
schema_eCDS_codedclinicalobservations = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ObsId", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("obsdetailsid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Coded_ObservationSNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Coded_ObservationDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Observation_Value", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("UCUM_Unit_of_Measurement", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Coded_Observation_Timestamp", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_CodedScoredAssessment
schema_eCDS_codedscoredassessment = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ObsId", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("Coded_Assessment_Tool_TypeSNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Coded_Assessment_Tool_TypeDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Person_Score", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Assessment_Tool_Validation_Timestamp", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_Comorbidity
schema_eCDS_comorbidity = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ComorbidityIDOrder", T.IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Comorbidity", T.StringType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("ComorbidityDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_Diagnosis
schema_eCDS_diagnosis = T.StructType([
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("DiagnosiosisDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("EC_Diagnosis_CodeSNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("Coded_Clinical_Entry_Seq_Num", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("EC_Diagnosis_QualifierSNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("DiagnosisQualifierDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("EC_Diagnosis_LataralitySNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("DiagnosisLataralityDesc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("DiagnosisComment", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
    T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    T.StructField("AmendOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Schema for ECDS_Diagnosis_xTab (Dynamic Schema)
# Define the initial schema fields
schema_fields_diagnosis_xtab = [
    T.StructField("visitarchiveid", T.IntegerType(), nullable=False)
]

# Dynamically create fields for diagnoses 1-10
for i in range(1, 11):
    schema_fields_diagnosis_xtab.extend([
        T.StructField(f"Diagnosiosis{i}Desc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
        T.StructField(f"EC_Diagnosis_Code{i}SNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
        T.StructField(f"DiagnosisQualifier{i}Desc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
        T.StructField(f"EC_Diagnosis_Qualifier{i}SNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
        T.StructField(f"DiagnosisLatarality{i}Desc", T.StringType(), nullable=True),
        T.StructField(f"EC_Diagnosis_Latarality{i}SNOMED", T.StringType(), nullable=True)
    ])

# Add InsertedOn field
schema_fields_diagnosis_xtab.append(T.StructField("InsertedOn", T.TimestampType(), nullable=True))

# Create the dynamic schema
schema_eCDS_diagnosis_xtab = T.StructType(schema_fields_diagnosis_xtab)
